name: IVDrugAbuse
title: IV Drug Abuse
description: OP-8 is the measure ID associated with the codes.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains ICD-10 codes associated with IV drug abuse.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with IV drug abuse.),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD-10 codes associated with IV drug abuse are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with IV drug abuse are excluded from this value set. Codes captured in systems other than ICD-10 are also excluded from the value set.)
